A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is a landmark in the Star Wars saga because it departs from many of the traditional assumptions of the first 2 trilogies and opens up to a new interpretation of the Force and those who use it. Rian Johnson does a phenomenal job with the visual presentation using bright and colorful worlds. The story takes a different turn nonetheless it leaves you longing for more and curious about how the final chapter will unfold.
